title: Exclusive beachfront 5-7 Bedroom Luxury villa in Laem Sor
description:
Key Features
 7 bedroom, 8 bathroom beach villa estate
 Located directly on Laem Sor beachfront 
 Huge 78 meter wide beach-frontage
 Oceanfront infinity swimming pool
 Large poolside Sala seating area 
 Large front landscaped lawn area
 High-quality furnishing & decoration 
 Modern open-plan living & dining
 Fully-equipped Western kitchen
 Large breakfast island/prep area
 Fully-extendable glass sliding-doors
 10-seat indoor wooden dining area
 Al Fresco outdoor dining area 
 Mezzanine day living room 
 Private fitness/ gym room
 Office/study/media room
 Private covered parking 
 Large landscaped garden
 Land size: 2880 sq.m
 Freehold ownership
 Chanote title 




Location details:
